item.title: After the Bubble:
item.description:
In 2001, Silicon Valley looked less like the future and more like a crime scene after the suspects had fled.Office parks emptied out almost overnight. Hand-painted startup logos still clung to glass doors. Whiteboards remained filled with abandoned…

Read the full article on Substack
